alert.note: Alert for Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 6:41PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Garfield County through 715 PM MDT... At 640 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles north of Rifle, or 27 miles northwest of Glenwood Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Garfield County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Debeque to Silt Corridor; Flat Tops
